sentences: Within Impact, there are 3 specific elements rated on a 1-5 scale: Our Mission, Financial and Operations/Brand.
UPS discloses our Scope 1, Scope 2 and Scope 3 greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions, along with an extensive breakdown of our GHG reporting policies in indicator 305 of our GRI Index.
Starting from a base year of 2020, we will reduce the CO2e per package delivered by 50% by 2035.
